QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Jeweler's Specs
QuestData.Description:
Are you looking for work, jewelcrafter? The Artisan's Consortium asked me to craft some spectacles for their customers.
Me! Like I have time for this.
You can do it, yeah?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Sundered Onyx Loupes to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver Sundered Onyx Loupes to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver Sundered Onyx Loupes to Haephesta
